pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hypixel: Python wrapper for the Hypixel-API.============================================.. image:: https://i.imgur.com/eFWzNiy.png :target: https://gitlab.com/Snuggie/hypixel.py :alt: hypixel.py Logo------------------.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/hypixel--api-python-brightgreen.svg?colorA=2d2306&colorB=705810 :target: https://api.hypixel.net :alt: Hypixel API - Python.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/hypixel.svg?colorA=2d2306&colorB=705810 :target: https://pypi.org/project/hypixel/ :alt: PiPy Version.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/build-not yet implemented :(-brightgreen.svg?colorA=2d2306&colorB=705810 :target: https://gitlab.com/SnuggIe/hypixel.py/pipelines :alt: Travis Ci Build.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/hypixel.svg?colorA=2d2306&colorB=705810 :target: https://pypi.org/project/hypixel/ :alt: Supported Python Versions.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/made%20by-snuggle%20|%20hypixel%20moderator-brightgreen.svg?colorA=2d2306&colorB=705810 :target: https://hypixel.net/player/Snuggle :alt: Made by SnuggleThis is a simple, unofficial Python library which allows you to get values from the Hypixel-API using a JSON request. Designed for use with the latest version of Python with two previous versions also tested.Please see `https://gitlab.com/Snuggie/hypixel.py <https://gitlab.com/Snuggie/hypixel.py>`_ for installation/usage information.
